SELECT /* etDeliRegnByZipCd.getRgnGrpList */ EDRBZC.ZIP_NO , EDRBZC.DELI_REGN_GB_CD , COALESCE(MP.CTP_NM,'') ||' '|| COALESCE(MP.SIG_NM,'') ||' '|| COALESCE(MP.EMD_NM,'') ||' '|| COALESCE(MP.ROAD_NM,'') AS BASE_ADDR FROM ET_DELI_REGN_BY_ZIP_CD EDRBZC , MV_POST MP WHERE EDRBZC.ZIP_NO = MP.ZIP_NO
AND DELI_REGN_GB_CD = #{deliRegnGbCd}
